mapper.select: select date_format(log.createtime,'%Y-%m') as yearAndMonth,count(*) as total,#{userId} as userId from ahs_user_spread_log log where log.parent_id =#{userId} group by date_format(log.createtime,'%Y-%m') order by date_format(log.createtime,'%Y-%m') desc

select DATE_FORMAT(log.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime,user.telephone as phone,user.nickname as name from ahs_user_spread_log log left join ahs_users user on log.user_id = user.id where log.parent_id =#{userId} and date_format(log.createtime,'%Y-%m') =#{yearAndMonth} order by log.createtime desc
select id, user_id, parent_id, createtime from ahs_user_spread_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
